entry.def: Nomadic people travel from place to place rather than living in one place all the time.

example.ex: ...the great nomadic tribes of the Western Sahara.
example.tran: 西撒哈拉伟大的游牧部落

entry.def: If someone has a nomadic way of life, they travel from place to place and do not have a settled home.

example.ex: The daughter of a railway engineer, she at first had a somewhat nomadic childhood.
example.tran: 作为一个铁路工程师的女儿，她最初的童年生活有些漂泊不定。

means.word_mean: 1. (of groups of people) tending to travel and change settlements frequently;

sentences.sentence: "believed the profession of a peregrine typist would have a happy future"
